resources.string: Version
Onix Music is a power-packed music player for Android 4.1 and higher focused on performance and panache
Artist images and biographies are provided by
Last.fm
Onix Music also uses the following open-source libraries:
Android Support Libraries
Support-v4 23.2.1, Appcompat-v7 23.2.1, RecyclerView 23.2.1, CardView 23.2.1, Design 23.2.1, Palette 23.2.1; distributed by the Android Open Source Project under an Apache License, Version 2.0
Gson
Version 2.4 distributed by Google, Inc. under an Apache License, Version 2.0
Glide
Version 3.6.1; distributed by Google, Inc. under a BSD License
VerticalSeekBar
Version 0.5.2; distributed by Haruki Hasegawa under an Apache License, Version 2.0
Thanks Ishani, for compiling the crazy database of social media profiles..
Last but not the least thanks to Akash, Shreshta, Subham and all my friends who helped me with testing the app
Text Drawable
Version 1.1, distributed by Amulya Khare under MIT license
FAB Reveal Layout
Version 1.0.0, distributed by Tomás Ruiz-López
Uses YouTube Android Player API Version 1.2.2
Disclaimer : I do not claim any ownership over any of the YouTube videos displayed in this application. They belong to their respective uploaders.
